mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY up_bno DESC,ordernum ASC,depth asc) AS no, bno,writer,btitle, IF(DATE_FORMAT(bdate,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(bdate,'%H:%i'), DATE_FORMAT(bdate,'%Y-%m-%d')) AS bdate, up_bno,depth,ordernum,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_consulting WHERE up_bno = b.bno) AS checkUp FROM board_consulting b LIMIT #{startRow}, 10;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_consulting (writer, btitle, bcontent) VALUES (#{writer}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT bno FROM board_consulting WHERE btitle = #{title} AND writer = #{writer} AND bcontent = #{content}
mapper.update: UPDATE board_consulting SET up_bno = #{bno} WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: SELECT bno,writer, btitle,bcontent,up_bno,depth,ordernum,DATE_FORMAT(bdate,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i") AS bdate FROM board_consulting WHERE bno = #{bno};
mapper.update: UPDATE board_consulting SET btitle = #{btitle}, bcontent = #{bcontent} WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_consulting (btitle, depth, ordernum, writer, bcontent, up_bno) VALUES (#{btitle}, #{depth} + 1,#{ordernum},#{writer}, #{bcontent}, #{up_bno})
mapper.select: SELECT gr_no,coun_no,gr_title,gr_content,gr_apply, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(gr_oper," ",gr_time),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'),' ~ ', DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(gr_time, INTERVAL 50 MINUTE), '%H:%i')) AS gr_oper, total_num,img, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM group_apply WHERE gr_no = b.gr_no) as apply_people FROM group_consulting b ORDER BY gr_oper DESC LIMIT #{startRow},8
